about_the_game:
Are you tired of complex games with endless mechanics and overwhelming graphics? Waste Time Auto Clicker is here to provide the ultimate minimalist experience: sit back and watch the points add up.

This idle clicker offers a pure and simple concept—points accumulate automatically without any effort. No upgrades, no distractions, no purpose—just endless clicking satisfaction.

Features:

  • Automatic Clicking: Watch as the points rack up effortlessly.

  • Level Progression: Rise through the levels by doing... nothing.

  • Steam Achievements: Showcase your dedication to wasting time with a complete set of achievements.

  • Retro Aesthetic: Minimalist, text-based visuals that embrace simplicity.

  • Endless Gameplay: No limits, no interruptions—just pure time-wasting fun.

Waste Time Auto Clicker is the ultimate way to embrace doing nothing. Perfect for those moments when you just want to sit back and let time pass.

Will you master the art of time-wasting?

name: Waste Time Auto Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) or Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable

short_description: Minimalist idle clicker where points accumulate automatically. No upgrades, no complexity, just pure time-wasting. With Steam achievements, level progression, and retro text aesthetics, it's perfect for moments when you just want to watch the numbers grow.
